name: Apple Worm: Logic Puzzle
description:
In this cute brain teaser game with crawling mechanics, you need to help the worm collect apples and escaping the level. Run through the maze in search of the treasured apples, but be careful, because the puzzles in this game are not as simple as they seem and are full of strategic traps. You need to correctly calculate your movements in order to get an apple, avoid all the dangers and get to the portal.

What’s Inside:
- Full version of the game
- Many interesting levels
- Easy controls
- Funny music
- Unique graphics

Be creative in finding solutions to every level, develop logic and planning skills. This game is easy to learn and perfect for all ages.

Good luck, have fun!

Questions? Contact our tech support at icestonesup@gmail.com
